text:
@Even though we only became  
friends this year, I've  
realized that you're not  
as reserved or shy  
judgemental as you see.  
I've realized that you  
can be a true softie  
like when you bought the  
cake for getting his photo  
an art exhibition)  
Sweetheart (when we  
used your bank account  
to book our Philly  
airbnb. Thanks for  
being there. I love  
you)
